Preface
This is the beginnings of documentation for the DocBook XSL Stylesheets. First of all, I would like to thank Norman Walsh for the work he has done in the framework of the DocBook DTD. If I have been using the DocBook DTD for a while, it is because he made his DSSSL (and later his XSL) stylesheets available for use at no cost. The barebones of the LaTeX stylesheets were heavily inspired on his previous work for HTML output.
